info.author: BmanDesign
info.description:
using a system of serial commands you can control almost any arduino board with nothing but python code! You will need to download the arduino code from my website, http://bmandesign.lfchosting.com under projects

In this version only <class name>.getState(<pin number>) works, thats why it is only in aplha, but by Tuesday, March 20th, 2012, i should have the rest uploaded
info.name: pyduino
info.summary: Control arduino with nothing but python code!
info.html_description:
using a system of serial commands you can control almost any arduino board with nothing but python code! You will need to download the arduino code from my website, http://bmandesign.lfchosting.com under projects

In this version only <class name>.getState(<pin number>) works, thats why it is only in aplha, but by Tuesday, March 20th, 2012, i should have the rest uploaded
